item.title: Power BI: extracting values
item.description: Question to be answered in this project: How many kids do married people have in average in our dataset? I cleaned the data first using the following tools /steps in Power BI: o Remove Top Rows o First row as a header o Changing column names o Removing invalid rows o Setting up the data types (replace values if necessary)
